about_the_game:
Step into the Future of Surgical Training with the Marion Surgical Robot Simulator!
Immerse yourself in a groundbreaking VR experience that blends state-of-the-art robotics with realistic surgical scenarios. Designed for surgeons, medical students, and anyone eager to explore the art and science of surgery, this simulator offers an unparalleled opportunity to refine your skills and master advanced techniques.

Pair your experience with an expert-led online course to deepen your understanding and gain a competitive edge in the medical field. Whether you're training for the OR or exploring the cutting-edge intersection of VR and healthcare, the Marion Surgical Robot Simulator is your ultimate tool for growth and innovation.

Elevate your skills. Redefine your training. Begin your journey today!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: PC
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Titan X, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 Desktop, 6 GB,
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest 2, Oculus Pro, Valve Pro with Index
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: PC
  • Processor: Intel i7/AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 20 series*/AMD Radeon RX 6000 series
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest 2, Oculus Pro, Valve Pro with Index
